image_generation_prompt_template:
Create a {character_nationality} WEBTOON style YouTube thumbnail (16:9 landscape).

★★★ MOST IMPORTANT - LAYOUT ★★★
1. Character in UPPER 65% of frame ONLY
2. BOTTOM 35% must be EMPTY with PLAIN SOLID COLOR (black, dark blue, or dark gray)
3. Character positioned CENTER-TOP

★★★ BANNED ELEMENTS (will reject image if present) ★★★
- BANNED: Yellow bars, yellow rectangles, yellow banners
- BANNED: Emergency tape, caution tape, police tape
- BANNED: Ribbons, decorative strips, diagonal lines
- BANNED: Text, letters, words, signs, labels
- BANNED: News tickers, headlines, lower thirds with text
- BANNED: Any decorative overlay elements

★★★ REQUIRED STYLE ★★★
- {character_nationality} webtoon/manhwa illustration
- Clean bold outlines, flat vibrant colors
- Exaggerated expression (surprised, shocked, worried)
- 30-50 year old {character_desc}
- Simple background related to topic (courtroom, office, etc.)

★★★ BOTTOM AREA REQUIREMENT ★★★
The bottom 35% of the image MUST be:
- Completely empty OR
- Simple solid dark color OR
- Simple gradient (dark)
This area is reserved for text overlay via PIL (not AI generated text).

Scene description:
{clean_prompt}

{text_instruction}

FINAL CHECK:
✓ Is bottom 35% empty/plain? (REQUIRED)
✓ No yellow bars/tape anywhere? (REQUIRED)
✓ No text/letters in image? (REQUIRED)
✓ Webtoon style character? (REQUIRED)
